Title: Requires the disclosure of video footage related to the death of an incarcerated individual involving a correctional officer
Summary: Requires the disclosure of video footage related to the death of an incarcerated individual involving a correctional officer to the attorney general's office of special investigation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring the disclosure of video footage related to the death of an incarcerated individual involving a correctional officer
